ComicInfo.Penciller: Art Adams,Erik Larsen,Andy Kuhn,Tom Scioli,Ryan Ottley,Adam Warren,Bruce Timm,Andy Kuhn,Tom Scioli,Erik Larsen,Ryan Ottley,Adam Warren,Bruce Timm
ComicInfo.Series: Giant Size Kung Fu Bible Stories
ComicInfo.Summary:
GIANT-SIZE KUNG FU BIBLE STORIES, edited by Erik Larsen (SAVAGE DRAGON) and Bruce Timm (Batman Adventures: Mad Love), features original stories of the world’s greatest cartoonists, and is a must-have.
GIANT-SIZE KUNG FU BIBLE STORIES includes seven awe-inspiring, pulse-pounding stories from Erik Larsen, Bruce Timm, Adam Warren (Empowered), Tom Scioli (GØDLAND), Ryan Ottley (INVINCIBLE), and Andy Kuhn (FIREBREATHER), and four breathtaking pinups by Arthur Adams (Uncanny X-Men).
ComicInfo.Title: Frankenstein of Mars; Destroyer of Worlds; Enter--Jack Champion!; Snowman Slaughter; Astronomus; Feel the Über-Burn; Secret Crisis on Ultimate Earth
